author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Brookfield Business Partners Qtrly Net Loss Per Limited Partnership Unit $1.25

organizations.name: brief-brookfield business partners qtrly net loss per limited partnership unit

text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Brookfield Business Partners LP :
* BROOKFIELD BUSINESS PARTNERS REPORTS 2017 YEAR END RESULTS
* BROOKFIELD BUSINESS PARTNERS LP QTRLY NET LOSS PER UNITHOLDER, EXCLUDING INCENTIVE DISTRIBUTION $0.35
* BROOKFIELD BUSINESS PARTNERS LP - QTRLY NET LOSS PER LIMITED PARTNERSHIP UNIT $1.25 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
